item.description:
Kayak/Canoe Quaboag River from Rt. 148 boat launch (in Brookfield) to Quaboag Pond and back.

Sunday July 8 - Meet at 1:00pm at boat ramp across the street from White's Landing.

***ON-SITE RENTALS AVAILABLE from White's Landing - see their website to call for reservations http://www.whitesland...

Suitable for beginners.

To get there -

From Rt. 9 to Rt. 148 South - It's 0.6 miles from Rt. 9 to the boat launch, which will be on the left, just before the river.

From Rt. 20 to Rt. 148 North - It's 6.9 miles from Rt. 20 to the boat launch, which will be on the right just after driving over the river.
item.name: Kayak/Canoe Quaboag River
